Name: THE ADVENTURES OF LWANDA MAGERE
About the game: Lwanda Magere was a nigh omnipotent being that once lived in Kenya (Africa). The Adventures of Lwanda Magere is a single-player action-adventure story based in Africa about his life experiences and interaction with other African heroes/beings. Get to experience his life and abilities first hand: You take the role of Lwanda Magere who has supernatural abilities, you’re immune to physical attacks but your shadow is the only weakness. You are the protector of the Luo people. You assist various communities and villages to maintain peace and order in any way possible. You’re in certain missions assisted by your pets e.g. lion to accomplish certain tasks. Enjoy the beautiful sights in Kenya and get to experience how powerful Lwanda Magere was as he settles disputes.
